description: Sums of digits of Smith numbers A006753.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smith Number
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Super-Poulet Number
mathematica: d[n_]:=IntegerDigits[n]; tr[n_]:=Transpose[FactorInteger[n]]; t={}; Do[If[!PrimeQ[n]&&(x=Total[d[n]])==Total[d@tr[n][[1]]*tr[n][[2]],2],AppendTo[t,x]],{n,4,1850}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 04 2013 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
